verse: That night I had a third vision. I looked up and saw a man with a measuring line in his hand.
Then the heavenly messenger who had been answering my questions since my first vision left my side, and a second messenger came and met him.
So said the Eternal, Commander of heavenly armies.
The Eternal will inherit Judah as His share in the holy land, and He will again choose Jerusalem as His city.
Hush, all people! Be silent before the Eternal, for He has awakened and has come in glory to Jerusalem from His holy home in heaven.
